hanzi-su-wiki:
謙

Значения

Скромничать, быть скромным

Мнемоника

Скромность, затрудненность 兼 речи 言, запинаться

Варианты

谦
purpleculture_pinyin:
qiān
modest
скромный
rtega_mnemonic:
謙謙RS
谦谦		humble, modest
  • humble speech 言 from somebody harvesting grain 兼
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 谦)
Antonyms: 滿
Pictophonetic: 兼 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
謙虛 [ qiān xū ]: modest; self-effacing; to make modest remarks
謙遜 [ qiān xùn ]: humble; modest; unpretentious; modesty
謙恭 [ qiān gōng ]: polite and modest
謙讓 [ qiān ràng ]: to modestly decline
謙和 [ qiān hé ]: meek; modest; amiable
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 兼 [ jiān ] both, and; at the same time; to unite, to combine
heisig_chinese_memo: I'm usually unassuming but if someone uses double the necessary words and starts studdoring, they might just be lying.
heisig_constituent: self-effacing, say, words, keitai, mouth, concurrently, animal horns, rake
Keyword_KANJIDIC: self-effacing, humble oneself, condescend, be modest
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: скромны, смиренны себя, снисходила, быть скромным
koohiiStory1: When you are self-effacing you use words to concurrently bring yourself down and make yourself look better.
koohiiStory2: Though the man´s words were self-effacing, his actions concurrently made it clear that his modesty was false.
jp_example_words:
謙る(へりくだる): to deprecate oneself and praise the listener
謙虚(けんきょ): modesty, humility
謙遜(けんそん): humble, humility, modesty
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: They say Mona Lisa had more modesty than any other woman at the time.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Leonardo da Vinci picked her for her modesty. She's so modest she shows no emotion.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The modesty of Mona Lisa inspired Ken (けん) the samurai to become more modest.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Have you met Ken the samurai in person? He never smiles, and will never show you his emotions. He's too modest for that.
Ru_Meaning: self-effacing, humble oneself, condescend, be modest
Ru_Notes: В kanjidic упущено употребимое чтение へりくだる.
Ru_Words:
謙るへりくだる
  • скромничать, принижать себя и превозносить собеседника
    • 謙虚けんきょ
  • скромность
    • 謙遜けんそん
  • скромность
Ru_Radicals: ｜, ハ, 并, ヨ, 言 (слово)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if you use double (兼) the words (言) you're being self-effacing
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When people are unassuming you don't need to speak double the number of words (repeat yourself).  They wait patiently and let you finish your sentences.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " speaking " and " combining ", the original meaning is modest and modest. "Shuowen": "Respect. From words and sounds." "Shu‧Da Yumo": "Such a loss, modest benefit."

" Modesty " can mean impairment or deficiency. "Yi Zhou Shu·Wu Sheng": "Since the victors raise their flags to give orders, order officials to forbid plunder, invade and violent, no knighthood, no loss of the land and house, each one should give priority to his relatives, the people's service is as good, and the military is also "Kong Chao's note: "Qian, it hurts."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " words " and " jian ", the original meaning is modest and modest.
humanum_full_description:
從「言」，「兼」聲，本義為謙虛、謙讓。《說文》：「敬也。从言，兼聲。」《書‧大禹謨》：「滿招損，謙受益。」

　　「謙」可表示減損、不足。《逸周書‧武稱》：「既勝人舉旗以號令，命吏禁掠，無取侵暴，爵位不謙，田宅不虧，各寧其親，民服如化，武之撫也。」孔晁注：「謙，損也。」
humanum_short_description: 從「言」，「兼」聲，本義為謙虛、謙讓。

謙字的基本解释

謙
qiān
见“谦”。

謙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiān］
［《廣韻》苦兼切，平添，溪。］
“嗛3”的被通假字。“谦1”的繁体字。
(1)谦虚；谦让。
(2)减损；不足。
(3)《周易》六十四卦之一，艮下坤上。
(4)通“嫌”。嫌疑。
(5)通“兼”。并。
[②]［qiè］
［《字彙》苦劫切］
“谦2”的繁体字。通“慊3”。
满足；快意。

謙字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　謙； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1175第20
〔古文〕?【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?苦兼切，歉平聲。【說文】敬也。【玉篇】讓也。【增韻】致恭也。不自滿也。又卦名。【易·謙卦】謙亨，君子有終。【釋文】?退爲義，屈己下物也。【朱子·本義】有而不居之義。【史記·樂書】君子以謙退爲禮。　又姓。見【字彙】。　又【集韻】或作嗛。【前漢·藝文志】易之嗛嗛。【師古註】與謙同。又【司馬相如·封禪書】陛下嗛讓而弗發也。【史記】作謙讓。　又【正韻】胡兼切。與嫌同。【荀子·仲尼篇】信而不處謙。【註】言得信於上，不處嫌疑，使人疑其作威福也。　又【集韻】【正韻】?苦簟切，歉上聲。安靜貌。【禮·大學】此之謂自謙。【註】謙讀爲慊。慊之言厭也。【朱傳】謙，快也，足也。【韻會】謙與慊通。　又【字彙】苦劫切，音怯。大學義同。朱子讀。　【六書統】一作?。

Also hexagram name. [Easy·Qian Gua] Qianheng, a gentleman has an end. 【Explanation】? Retreat to righteousness, and succumb to one's own things. [Zhu Zi·The original meaning] The meaning of having but not living. 【Historical Records·Book of Music】The gentleman takes courtesy of humility.　Another last name. See 【Vocabulary】.　 [Ji Yun] or 嗛. Name meaning

qiān
вм. 谦
Radicals: 言, 兼  (say, mona-lisa)
Meaning Mnemonic
They say Mona Lisa had more modesty than any other woman at the time.
Leonardo da Vinci picked her for her modesty. She's so modest she shows no emotion.
Reading Mnemonic
The modesty of Mona Lisa inspired Ken (けん) the samurai to become more modest.
Have you met Ken the samurai in person? He never smiles, and will never show you his emotions. He's too modest for that.
